title: 111: Bart Balboa: A Song Only Exists Through The Person Who Listens To It
itunes:title: 111: Bart Balboa: A Song Only Exists Through The Person Who Listens To It
description:
This week Jeremy interviews Bart Balboa of the band Birds In Row

On this episode Jeremy and Bart talk about his first tour back after a couple years, becoming a Twitch streamer, video games, Fête de la Musique, going to a rock school,  learning guitar and his first band Sling 69, his first time recording, discovering bands like Amanda Woodward, writing lyrics in French, Vitriol records, their grueling first US tour, selling merch for donation based, Amaury Suavé, their new album Gris Klein, how he got into tattooing, and so much more! 

SUBSCRIBE TO THE PATREON to hear a bonus episode where Bart answered questions that were submitted by subscribers!

Follow the show on INSTAGRAM and TWITTER
